tool_description: Changing our food habits and how we track our health should be easy, as easy as taking a quick picture, speaking to the application and talking about what you had for lunch, or even writing about it and getting all the useful info and insights a person needs.
name: Nutrifai
title: Nutrifai

api_list.name: Get image results
api_list.description: Get the result of image processing.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nutrifai1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/image/to5krr67"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nutrifai1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nutrifai1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/image/{image_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nutrifai1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get speech results
api_list.description: Get the result of the process for the given speech id.

api_list.name: Get text results
api_list.description: Get the nutrition values of foods in a text.

required_parameters.name: food_text
required_parameters.default: 120 grams of apple and a Pizza
